text: Krasnopushcha () - village in Berezhany Raion of Ternopil Oblast, Ukraine. ==Population== *Population in 2001: 191 inhabitants with over 40 houses. ==Gallery== File:Монастир у Краснопущі ХІХ століття.jpg|Basilian monastery in Krasnopushcha, ХІХ File:Краснопуща, монастир Різдва святого Івана Хрестителя.jpg|Basilian monastery, 2016 ==References== ==Sources== * ==External links== * Category:Villages in Berezhany Raion
title: Krasnopushcha
